text: Vincent Michael Martella (born October 15, 1992) is an American actor and singer. He played Greg Wuliger on the UPN/CW sitcom Everybody Hates Chris who was the only white character who didn't hate Chris. Martella also played Phineas Flynn in the Disney Channel original animated show Phineas and Ferb He also played Bradley Nicholson in Milo Murphyâ€™s Law. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Rochester, New York Category:Singers from New York (state)
